.entry-content

Who We Are
Our Mission
Seeking to put God’s love into action, we bring people together to build homes, communities, and hope.
Row Backgrounds
Our Vision
A world where everyone has a decent place to live.
Row Backgrounds
About Us
Habitat for Humanity of Marion County, a locally run affiliate of Habitat for Humanity International, is a part of a global nonprofit housing organization operated on Christian principles that seeks to put God’s love into action by building homes, communities, and hope. We believe that everyone deserves a safe and decent place to live, and we work tirelessly with families, volunteers, and donors to make this vision a reality. By constructing affordable homes, we provide stability, self-reliance, and a brighter future for those in need.
Row Backgrounds

Financial & Policy
​
990 Form 2020-2021 ➜
990 Form 2021-2022 ➜
Audit 2020-2021 ➜
Audit 2021-2022 ➜
Policy:
Our Commitment to Our Donors —
We will not sell, share or trade our donors’ names or personal information with any other entity, nor send mailings to our donors on behalf of other organizations. This policy applies to all information received by Habitat for Humanity of Marion County, both online and offline, on any Platform (“Platform”, includes the Habitat for Humanity of Marion County website and mobile applications), as well as any electronic, written, or oral communications. To the extent any donations are processed through a third-party service provider, our donors’ information will only be used for purposes necessary to process the donation.
​
Non-Proselytizing Policy
“As a matter of policy, Habitat for Humanity International and its affiliated organizations do not proselytize. This means that Habitat will not offer assistance on the expressed or implied condition that people must either adhere to or convert to a particular faith, or listen and respond to messaging designed to induce conversion to a particular faith”.
Row Backgrounds
.entry-content
